name: Detox Shampoo

This product is also cruelty-free and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This cleansing shampoo is infused with hydrolyzed keratin making it color safe. It‚Äôs scented with Melrose‚Äîa rose fragrance with hints of bergamot, lychee, cedarwood, and white musk.  Use Detox Shampoo 1x a week when your hair and scalp feels like it needs a deeper cleanse (scalp is oily, hair is lacking shine, curls have lost volume and/or shape, etc).
ingredients: -Chelating Agents: Helps remove hard water deposits and impurities..-Apple Cider Vinegar: Helps exfoliate and remove flakes, residue, and buildup, keeping hair healthy and shiny..-Hydrolyzed Keratin: Helps soften, smooth, frizz and add shine..AQUA (WATER, EAU), SODIUM C14-16 OLEFIN SULFONATE, SODIUM LAUROYL METHYL ISETHIONATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, ACRYLATES COPOLYMER, COCAMIDE MIPA, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), POLYSORBATE 20, HYDROLYZED KERATIN,   HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, VINEGAR, PEG-150 DISTEARATE,    POLYQUATERNIUM-7, GLYCERIN, BENZOPHENONE-4, SODIUM CHLORIDE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE,   TETRASODIUM EDTA, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL,    PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, DISODIUM EDTA, CHLORPHENESIN, SODIUM BENZOATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, CI 14700 (RED 4), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5), CI 61570 (GREEN 5)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..Detangle and brush your hair before getting in the shower. This helps to loosen any product buildup, stimulates the scalp and removes tangles. ..Wet hair with luke-warm water from roots to end. Squeeze out extra water...Take a quarter size amount of DETOX SHAMPOO and mix it into your hands...Apply directly to the scalp first then work through hair focusing on roots then mid-shaft and ends. ..Leave on for 1 to 3 minutes...Rinse and follow with TREATMENT MASQUE...Use 1x a week or whenever you need a deeper cleanse.
